p: The anti-cancer ferutinin activity was also evaluated in vivo, in comparison with cisplatin, on tumors developed in hybrid BALB/C mice: a tumor reduction of 67% for ferutinin and of 72% for cisplatin was observed; however while the latter produced a significant alteration of the liver tissues and the spleen of the treated mice, this did not happen for mice in treatment with ferutinin [ 95].
